answers.answer: It means it's time to see a doctor for a full health checkup. If you are diabetic and have ignored controlling and managing your diabetes it may be signs of peripheral neuropathy. Also, could be related to Fibromyalgia and/or Arthritis and/or a hidden infection that you cannot see which only tests can reveal.Good luck -

question: What does it mean when your hands are sweaty, finger tips are tingling, joints are achy and sometimes feel like a burning sensation?
title: Funny feeling in hands
